InstructionData.Title: MaxTankPressure
InstructionData.Author: Orpheus2468
InstructionData.Instructions:
define TankGasIso 1280378227 define TankGas -1606848156 define TankGasSmallIso 272136332 define TankGasSmall 1013514688 define IceCrusher 443849486 define PipeAnalyser 435685051 define MaxPressure 55000 #kPa define Mixer 2104106366
alias VKE r0 alias VKE2 r1 alias PressureReal r2 Main: lb PressureReal TankGasIso Pressure Maximum sle VKE PressureReal MaxPressure or VKE VKE VKE2 lb PressureReal TankGas Pressure Maximum sle VKE PressureReal MaxPressure or VKE VKE VKE2 lb PressureReal TankGasSmallIso Pressure Maximum sle VKE PressureReal MaxPressure or VKE VKE VKE2 lb PressureReal TankGasSmall Pressure Maximum sle VKE PressureReal MaxPressure or VKE VKE VKE2
#lb PressureReal PipeAnalyser Pressure Maximum #sle VKE2 PressureReal MaxPressure #and VKE VKE VKE2 sb IceCrusher On VKE
#sb Mixer On VKE
j Main
